sn54.7:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma mahakappino bhagavato avidure nisinno hoti pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
sn54.7:1.3: Addasa kho bhagava ayasmantam mahakappinam avidure nisinnam pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
sn54.7:2.1: “Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etassa bhikkhuno kayassa injitattam va phanditattam va”ti?
sn54.7:2.2: “Yadapi mayam, bhante, tam ayasmantam passama sanghamajjhe va nisinnam ekam va raho nisinnam, tadapi mayam tassa ayasmato na passama kayassa injitattam va phanditattam va”ti.
sn54.7:3.1: “Yassa, bhikkhave, samadhissa bhavitatta bahulikatatta neva kayassa injitattam va hoti phanditattam va, na cittassa injitattam va hoti phanditattam va, tassa so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu samadhissa nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
sn54.7:3.2: Katamassa ca, bhikkhave, samadhissa bhavitatta bahulikatatta neva kayassa injitattam va hoti phanditattam va, na cittassa injitattam va hoti phanditattam va?
sn54.7:4.1: Anapanassatisamadhissa, bhikkhave, bhavitatta bahulikatatta neva kayassa injitattam va hoti phanditattam va, na cittassa injitattam va hoti phanditattam va.
sn54.7:4.2: Katham bhavite ca, bhikkhave, anapanassatisamadhimhi katham bahulikate neva kayassa injitattam va hoti phanditattam va, na cittassa injitattam va hoti phanditattam va?
sn54.7:5.1: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va nisidati pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
sn54.7:5.4: Evam bhavite ca kho, bhikkhave, anapanassatisamadhimhi evam bahulikate neva kayassa injitattam va hoti phanditattam va, na cittassa injitattam va hoti phanditattam va”ti.
